mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_admin_user ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, username, password, ap_list, adviser_id, mara_id, official_id, session_id, gmt_login, login_ip, status) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{username}, #{password}, #{apList}, #{adviserId}, #{maraId}, #{officialId}, null, now(), '127.0.0.1', 'ENABLED');
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, ap_list AS apList, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, session_id AS sessionId, gmt_login AS gmtLogin, login_ip AS loginIp, status FROM tb_admin_user WHERE status != 'DISABLED' AND username = #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND password = #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT id, username, ap_list AS apList, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, session_id AS sessionId, gmt_login AS gmtLogin, login_ip AS loginIp, status FROM tb_admin_user WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT id, username, ap_list AS apList, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, session_id AS sessionId, gmt_login AS gmtLogin, login_ip AS loginIp, status FROM tb_admin_user WHERE username = #{username};
